version_description:
In the newest version(v3.1.2), there is a problem that timetable data does not appear properly.
we currently undergoing maintenance to fix the problem.
We deeply apologize for the inconvenience and ask for your kind understanding.

[v3.1.2]
- Improved list view
- Fixed major bug
- Improved stability

[v3.1.3]
- Fixed timetable bug

[v3.1.4]
- Improved Widget
- Improved Date picker
- Minor bugs fixed
- Improved stability

[v3.1.5]
- Improved To do/ Anniversary/ Timetable UX
- Removed DAUM calendar from calendar import option
- Minor bugs fixed
- Improved stability

[v3.1.6]
- Support for iOS9
- New Option to on/off Holiday and lunar calendar

[v3.1.8]
- Support for Xcode7
- Bug fixed

[v3.1.9]
- Anniversary bug fixed
- Bugs fixed

[v3.2.3]
- Time table bug fixed
- New app icon

[v3.2.4]
- Display Weekly Weather Features Improved
- Timetable features bug fixed
- Other Bug fixed

[v3.2.5]
- Bug fixed

[v3.2.7]
- IOS 10 support fixed

[v3.2.9]
- IOS 10 support sync bug fixed
- bug fixed

[v3.2.10]
- IOS 10 support bug fixed
- bug fixed

[v3.3.2]
- Add map link function
- End of Service about Works Mobile calendar account in Naver calendar app
- Bug fixed

[v3.3.3]
- Improved App accessibility
- Bug fixed

[v3.3.4]
- Improve authentication method with Google account
- Bug fixed

[v3.3.5]
- Fixed the issue of completed events/tasks display error
- Bug fixed

[v3.3.6]
Fixed deleted to-do sync errors

[v3.3.7]
- Improve App accessibility

[v3.3.8]
- Improve App accessibility
- Improved iOS 11 support
- Other bug fixes

[v3.3.9]
- bug fixed

[v3.4.0]
- bug fixed

[v3.4.1]
- iPhone X support
- Add lock setting function with Face ID
- Add Mark - New Year's holiday and Chuseok holidays

[v3.4.2]
- Bug fixed

[v4.1.4]
App termination error fixed (when running app outside of Korea only)
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.4 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v3.4.3]
- Time table Bug fixed

[v4.0]
UI design renewed
More view-types added
Smart briefing added
Side menu and Setting improved ※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v.4.0 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.0.2]
Category name input error fixed
Timetable display error fixed
Other bugs fixed
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.0.2 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1]
Setting > Monthly view font size option added
Quick sticker added
Sticker category improved
Bug fixed
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1.1]
[Setting>Start of week] bug fixed
※ If your password does not match after updating to the previous version(v4.1.0), please delete the existing app and install again.
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.1 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1.2]
Bug fixed an error that the timetable was not visible
※ If your password does not match after updating to the previous version(v4.1.0), please delete the existing app and install again.
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.2 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1.3]
Setting > See dualview option added
Setting > Autocomplete event added
Quick button UX improved
Event order error on Monthly view fixed
Bug fixed
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.3 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1.4]
App termination error fixed (when running app outside of Korea only)
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.4 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1.5]
Fixed sync error when registering anniversary in the app
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.5 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1.6]
Improved to display category name when selecting color(category) of event
Other bug fixes
※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.6 is available in iOS 10.0 and after.

[v4.1.7]
- Attach photo & file to the special events
- Improved input function of description text field
- Added sync period options (Last 1 year, 2 year)
- To-do notification error and other bug fixes

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.7 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.8]
- Fix the issue of app forced shutdown
- Fix the issue of omission of default alarm setting when you create an event

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.8 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.9]
- Add Naver reservation calendar

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.9 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.10]
- Add Monthly widget and dark mode widget style
- Apply card view style UI
- Support using the lunar calendar in different time zones (including KST)
- Other bug fixes

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.10 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.11]
- Fix the issue of app forced shutdown

[v4.1.10]
- Add Monthly widget and dark mode widget style
- Apply card view style UI
- Support using the lunar calendar in different time zones (including KST)
- Other bug fixes

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.11 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.12]
- Change of login module to fix the issue of app forced shutdown
- Add Apple login feature

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.12 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.13]
- Dark mode
- Separate ‘Holidays’ and ‘Lunar ・Solar terms’ calendar
- Fix the issue of monthly widget’s date change in different time zone
- Fix the issue that biometric ID confirm dialog is exposed when closing the app

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.13 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.14]
- Fix app crash

[v4.1.13]
- Dark mode
- Separate ‘Holidays’ and ‘Lunar ・Solar terms’ calendar
- Fix the issue of monthly widget’s date change in different time zone
- Fix the issue that biometric ID confirm dialog is exposed when closing the app

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.14 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.1.15]
- Add a timetable widget
- Creating an event is available from 1900
- Available to set college・general timetable within 00:00 ~ 24:00 (Max 18 hours)
- Add a ‘start same time as the first day’ option when create a subject (‘college・general’ only)
- Fix the text truncated issue when sending a sharing URL to Kakao talk service
- Other bug fixes

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.1.15 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.2.0]
- Add OS14 home screen widgets (List/Mini Calendar/D-day)
- Add Home screen quick actions (touch and hold an app icon)
- Other bug fixes

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.2.0 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.

[v4.2.1]
- Fix the issue of strikethrough of completed events not displayed on Dual/List view
- Fix the issue of some date info on the widget not displayed
- Improve D-day widget feature
- Other bug fixes

※ Updated NAVER Calendar app v4.2.1 is available in iOS 11.0 and after.
